name: UNavMovementComponent
doc: NavMovementComponent defines base functionality for MovementComponents that move any 'agent' that may be involved in AI pathfinding.

NavAgentProps: Properties that define how the component can move.
FixedPathBrakingDistance: Braking distance override used with acceleration driven path following (bUseAccelerationForPaths)
bUpdateNavAgentWithOwnersCollision: If set to true NavAgentProps' radius and height will be updated with Owner's collision capsule size
bUseAccelerationForPaths: If set, pathfollowing will control character movement via acceleration values. If false, it will set velocities directly.
bUseFixedBrakingDistanceForPaths: If set, FixedPathBrakingDistance will be used for path following deceleration

methods.name: IsFalling
methods.doc: Returns true if currently falling (not flying, in a non-fluid volume, and not on the ground)

methods.name: IsFlying
methods.doc: Returns true if currently flying (moving through a non-fluid volume without resting on the ground)

methods.name: IsMovingOnGround
methods.doc: Returns true if currently moving on the ground (e.g. walking or driving)

methods.name: IsSwimming
methods.doc: Returns true if currently swimming (moving through a fluid volume)

methods.name: StopActiveMovement
methods.doc: Stops applying further movement (usually zeros acceleration).

methods.name: StopMovementKeepPathing
methods.doc: Stops movement immediately (reset velocity) but keeps following current path
